Text: I would seed except before i read this torrent i read "Britains.Got.Talent.S06E01.hdtv.xvid-][ Series 6 - Auditions 1 ]" and there you promise to block people who are using torrent clients you don't like. I don't like people who do that on public trackers so the trade off is i won't be seeding this.  I'm just one person so you probably won't care that much. If you want to get all anal about things go to one of the private tracker sites  or set up your own.  As a BTW, I didn't upload this days ago simply because of what an ass you were in comments on your upload of ep 5 of this show, which you did get from 2HD and fix the audio synchronisation of.
